title: Why is the Riven emote with the Battle Bunny skin on?
body:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p4ZERR70u9E/WahhQz5Hm4I/AAAAAAABEwo/kdomHtdC9DwZlB3NHtyFT7Sox5ocWyN-QCLcBGAs/s1600/fed0fe2189e77c0a.png

All the emotes that were not released for an event use champions's base skin. Why is Riven the only exception?

replies.body:
Well, the name of the emote is hopping mad. Bunny.....hopping....Riven does a lot of hopping herself. Riven is also a fairly popular champ herself........Honestly, I have no fudging idea.

>All the emotes that were not released for an event use champions's base skin.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/84/Let%27s_Do_This_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20171120231623

Because battle bunny should be her default skin, she looks better like that. 
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
It's kind of sad for a champion to be more memorable by her "sexy" skin than by her default one :/
